suites.title: Home page, Buttons, Catalogs, Image and links.
suites.description: Website Home page, must be rightly functional.
suites.preconditions: User must be register on teodor.bg with Email.

cases.title: Changing the language of the website.
cases.description: User must be able to change language of the website from BG to RO.

steps.action: **Click on the Navigation menu left on screen ‘‘BG’’**
**Drop-down menu choose ‘‘RO’’**
steps.expected_result: The language of the website is changed

cases.title: Change the currency of website.
cases.description: User must be able to change currency of website from BGN to EUR.

steps.action: **Click on the Navigation menu left on screen ‘‘BGN’’.**
**Drop-down menu choose ‘‘EUR’’.**
steps.expected_result:
```
The currency has been changed successfully.
```

cases.title: H8S button.
cases.description: User must be able to review H8S catalog using button.

steps.action: Click on H8S
steps.expected_result: H8S page appears. New banner is avalivable.

cases.title: Promotions button.
cases.description: User must be able to use Promotions button.

steps.action: Click on  Promotions button.
steps.expected_result:
**Drop-down menu appears with two options;**

1Reduced products

2Buy 3 Get 20%

steps.action: Click on Reduced products
Click on  Promotions button.
steps.expected_result:
**Drop-down menu appears with two options;**

1Reduced products

2Buy 3 Get 20%

steps.action: Click on 2Buy 3 Get 20%

cases.title: Clothes button.
cases.description: The user must be able to use Clothes button and all **Drop-down menu options**.

steps.action: Click on Clothes.
Click on any of 17 options

cases.title: Shoes button.
cases.description: User must be able to use shoes buton.

steps.action: Click on Shoes button
Click on any of 4 options

cases.title: Accessories button.
cases.description: The user must be able to use accessories button  and all **Drop-down menu options**.

steps.action: Click on accessories button
Click on any of 14 options

cases.title: Vouchers button.
cases.description: The user must be able to use Vouchers button.

steps.action: Click on Vouchers button.

cases.title: Shops button.
cases.description: The user must be able to use Shops button and seen all information.

steps.action: Click the button Shops.
Choose burgas
steps.expected_result: Information about shops in  Burgas appear like Phone, Adress, Contact, Work time.

steps.action: Choose any of Shops more details .
steps.expected_result:
More info appears like:

[**GPS COORDINATES**](tel:+359878454577) **and** 
transport.

cases.title: Catalog button.
cases.description: User must be able to use button catalog and seen information inside it .

steps.action: Click on catalog
Scroll down **Product List Page**
Chose any product from **Product List Page**

cases.title: For Clients button.
cases.description: User must be able to seen all big customers company of teodor.bg

steps.action: Click For Clients button.
steps.expected_result: All clients logo appears and information about the connection between them.

cases.title: Blog button.
cases.description: User must be able to seen all blogs and Articles.

steps.action: Click on Blog button .
steps.expected_result:
```
Related articles with teodor.bg will appears
```

```
```

steps.action: Click on any articles.
Scrool down the page.
steps.expected_result:
All images must be opened with full 
size properly

steps.action: Check the text for gramma and speling mistakes

cases.title: Video button.
cases.description: User must be able to use video button and open video without problem.

steps.action: Click Video button.
Choose any of video
Click on start video

cases.title: Contact button.
cases.description: User must be able to use Contact button and send messege to email.

steps.action: Click on contact
steps.expected_result: Empty text fields appears and types of contacts.

steps.action: Enter data
steps.data:
Name Emanoel

Email : emanoel.k.petrov@gmail.com

Phone: 35988xxxxxxx

About: n/a

Messages: Hello

steps.action: Mark im not a robot.
Click Send.

cases.title: Serch button. (N)
cases.description: User must be not able to receiving result after enter data less than 3 digits

steps.action: Click on Serch button.
Enter data
Click on Serch button again
steps.expected_result: Receiving system message : Minimum length of the search query 3

steps.action: Click on serch button.
Enter data .
Click on serch button again
Click on any results

cases.title: Shoping cart button
cases.description: Shoping cart button must workin properly

steps.action: Click on shoping cart button.
steps.expected_result: Shoping cart list product appear and options click here for add in cart .

steps.action: Click on Click here.
Chooce any product from Home page.
steps.expected_result: Products opened sucesfull with diferents colors and type of it .

steps.action: Choose any product.
steps.expected_result: Product opened sucesful with many options for color, size, fast delivery, add to favorites  and add to cart.

steps.action: Mark size and click on Add to cart .
steps.expected_result: System message appear:You have added a WHITE LINEN SHORT SLEEVE SHIRT to your cart.

steps.action: Click on Cart button again in right corner .
steps.expected_result: The product whos we choose appears with many options.

cases.title: Shoping cart button holded.
cases.description: User must be able to removing product from cart button.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open www.teodor.bg

2. Add one product to the cart

steps.action: From home page, hold the cart button.
steps.expected_result: The product apper in small window

steps.action: Click on remove it .
steps.expected_result: Are you sure you want to reduce this product from the cart? Have to options: Yes and No

steps.action: Click Yes .
Click on Favorites button.
steps.expected_result: System message appears :There are no products in the favorites list.

steps.action: Click on hero to go in Home page.
steps.expected_result: Result will home page opened properly.

steps.action: Chooce any product from Home page.
steps.expected_result: Products opened sucesfull with diferents colors and type of it .

steps.action: Choose any product.
steps.expected_result: Product opened sucesful with many options for color, size, fast delivery, add to favorites and add to cart.

steps.action: Click on  add to favorite.
steps.expected_result: System message appear :’’MELANGE T-SHIRT WITH CONTRASTING EDGES has been added to your wish list Click here to continue shopping.’’

steps.action: Click on Add to favorite button again in right corner.
steps.expected_result: The product whos we choose appear.

cases.title: Favorites make comment.
cases.description: User must be able to make comment under favorites product.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open www.teodor.bg

2. Add one product to the favorites.

steps.action: From home page, click on favorites.
Hold the mouse on the product.
steps.expected_result: Empty text field occur for comment.

steps.action: Enter comentar .
Moving the mouse out of product .
Hold the mouse on the product again.

cases.title: Favorites share a list of desired products.
cases.description: User must be able to make comment under favorites product.
cases.preconditions:
1. Open www.teodor.bg

2. Add one product to the favorites.

steps.action: From home page, click on favorites.
Click on share a list of desired products.
steps.expected_result: Two empty fields occur with Email and message.

steps.action: Enter data
Click send.
steps.expected_result: Receiving system message: Your Wish List has been shared.
